name: Simari
description: Jungle-born, agile, expressive, and curious, the Simari use their prehensile tails and flexible frames to explore impossible terrain. Their villages sit high among sprawling canopy bridges.

features.name: Primal Senses
features.description: You are proficient in Perception checks.

features.name: Prehensile Tail
features.description: You can grasp light objects, assist climbing, and manipulate tools with your tail. You may use any tool kit at disadvantage if it is not intended for the job.
